name: Centi-Smash
description:
Play as a rampaging centipede, fighting your way out of a mine filled with hazards.

Controls:

WASD for movement

SPACE for jumping over spikes and ramming into walls and enemies

Credits:

Most tiles - https://opengameart.org/content/game-boy-platformer-tileset-character

Jump sound - https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350904/

Death sound - https://freesound.org/people/AudioPapkin/sounds/510079/

Move sound - https://freesound.org/people/SoundFX.studio/sounds/456273/
